StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetNumberofNwasForRSS]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Recrui.ngOrgID integer, @BeginDate date.me, @NewRSS bit, @NWAs integer OUTPUT AS
SET ArithAbort ON SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @TotalNWAs DECIMAL DECLARE @AVG DECIMAL (4,1) DECLARE @NumRSSs INT
--- if the RSS has been open at least 3 months (@NewRSS = 0) then get its number of contracts IF @NewRSS = 0 BEGIN
SELECT n.NWA_ID, n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INTO #Nwa FROM [dbo].[NWA] n WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE n.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID AND n.NWA_DECLARED_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @BeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @BeginDate) AND n.nwa_id NOT IN (select nwa_id FROM dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS c where c.nwa_id=n.nwa_id AND c.disposi.on_code = 'PA' and c.status_e.ec.ve_date = (select max(cs.status_e.ec.ve_date) from candidate_status cs where cs.nwa_id = n.nwa_id))
-- records created as a result of a Component Code change. SELECT DISTINCT n.NWA_ID INTO #NwaZkc FROM #Nwa N INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA N_OLD ON N_OLD.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND N_OLD.NWA_ID = (SELECT MAX(N2.NWA_ID) FROM NWA N2 WHERE N2.NWA_ID < N.Nwa_ID AND N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = N2.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID) INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACT C_OLD ON C_OLD.NWA_ID = N_OLD.NWA_ID WHERE C_OLD.DISCHARGE_CODE = 'ZKC' AND N_OLD.NWA_ID < N.Nwa_ID
-- Component Code is no longer excluded --DELETE FROM #Nwa WHERE NWA_ID IN (SELECT NWA_ID FROM #NwaZkc)
SELECT @NWAs = COUNT(NWA_ID) FROM #Nwa
DROP TABLE #Nwa DROP TABLE #NwaZkc
END ELSE BEGIN /* IF THIS RSS HAS BEEN OPEN LESS THAN 3 MONTHS THEN GET THE AVERAGE NUMBER OF CONTRACTS FOR ALL THE RSSs UNDER THE PARENT RS */ SELECT n.NWA_ID, n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INTO #Nwa2 FROM [dbo].[NWA] n WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] om ON n.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = om.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE om.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = (SELECT om2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] om2 WHERE om2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID) AND n.NWA_DECLARED_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @BeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @BeginDate) AND n.nwa_id NOT IN (select nwa_id FROM dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS c where c.nwa_id=n.nwa_id AND c.disposi.on_code = 'PA' and c.status_e.ec.ve_date = (select max(cs.status_e.ec.ve_date) from candidate_status cs where cs.nwa_id = n.nwa_id))
-- records created as a result of a Component Code change. SELECT DISTINCT n.NWA_ID INTO #NwaZkc2 FROM #Nwa2 N INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA N_OLD ON N_OLD.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND N_OLD.NWA_ID = (SELECT MAX(N2.NWA_ID) FROM NWA N2 WHERE N2.NWA_ID < N.Nwa_ID AND N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = N2.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID) INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACT C_OLD ON C_OLD.NWA_ID = N_OLD.NWA_ID WHERE C_OLD.DISCHARGE_CODE = 'ZKC' AND N_OLD.NWA_ID < N.Nwa_ID
-- Component Code is no longer excluded --DELETE FROM #Nwa2 WHERE NWA_ID IN (SELECT NWA_ID FROM #NwaZkc2)
SELECT @TotalNWAs = COUNT(NWA_ID) FROM #Nwa2
DROP TABLE #Nwa2 DROP TABLE #NwaZkc2
SET @NumRSSs = (SELECT COUNT(RO.ORGANIZATION_ID) FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] OM ON RO.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = (SELECT OM2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] OM2 WHERE OM2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID) AND RO.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'RSS' AND RO.ISOPEN = 'Y')
IF @NumRSSs > 0 BEGIN SET @AVG = @TotalNWAs/@NumRSSs END ELSE BEGIN SET @AVG = 0 END
--- ROUND THE AVERAGE UP AND RETURN THE NUMBER OF NWAs SET @NWAs = CEILING(@AVG)
END
